page.title: 21Entertainment in Sheffield
page.content:
The Lyceum and Crucible theatre have both been re-modernised. There is now a Don Valley Stadium, Valley Centre-entertainment, Sheffield Arena and cinema complex at Meadowhall centre. The Roxy's night club is still night club/venue, but called the O2 Academy. There are several nightclubs around Sheffield. There is more live music in Sheffield.

Liz Frampton, Communication officer for Sheffield 50+
